data.title: Salary, Income, Net Worth: Dwight Howard
data.meta_description: Check salary, income and/or net worth of Dwight Howard at Paywizard.org
data.text:
Earnings overview:

Basket News Nov 2022: Dwight Howard recently signed with Taoyuan Leopards in Taiwan, and his salary was revealed. Howard will earn over $1 million.

Basketball Reference Oct 2021: salary $2,641,691

Spotrac.com 2021: BASE SALARY: $2,564,753

NbaPassion Aug 2019: Dwight Howard surrendered nearly $2.6M of his $5.6M guaranteed salary to Memphis in buyout. He can earn $2.6M on his vet minimum deal with Lakers.

As reported by Bobby Marks of ESPN, this contract is called "Summer contract", and provides for a salary of $ 14.490 per day starting October 21st, near the beginning of the regular season. The contract is not guaranteed, and will allow the Gialloviola to cut Howard within the deadline of 10 January 2020.

Spotrac May 2017: $23.5 million

Forbes Jan. 2016: $27.4 million

Forbes June 2015: $25.5 million

Forbes Jan. 2015: $25.9 million

Forbes Nov. 2014: $26.5 million

Forbes June 2014: $25.5 million
